The Mad Clay Myth
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: The Mad Clay Myth
By _darkarchon on Monday, September 3, 2001 - 06:33 am:

This is an annoying myth which I will describe in detail. Basically it consists of you beating mad clay in the Errantry and something special happening. Well here's a few laughs.
NOTE: THE FOLLOWING IS NOT TRUE

You beat mad clay either

1) In one hit
2) When you have 1 Lif
3) In 30 seconds

Then...
Either
1) The tool to make it obey in it's forehead
falls out and you get it as an item.
2) There's a cinema in which Colt takes the tool
and uses it on Mad Clay

Finally...
Either
1)It obeys you and fights with you in the tourneys
2)You can freeze it and it has all stats at 999.
3)A combination of the two.
